description: Core ontology for generic digital twin onboarding - collecting identity, expertise, and knowledge

intent_nodes.label: Primary Use Case
intent_nodes.description: What the twin is being created for

intent_nodes.label: Twin Goal
intent_nodes.description: What the twin should help accomplish

intent_nodes.label: Boundaries
intent_nodes.description: What the twin should avoid or never do

required_nodes.label: Areas of Expertise
required_nodes.description: Topics and domains the user is expert in

required_nodes.label: Unique Perspective
required_nodes.description: What makes the user's viewpoint unique

required_nodes.label: Common Questions
required_nodes.description: Questions people frequently ask the user

required_nodes.label: Communication Style
required_nodes.description: How the user prefers to communicate

question_templates.template: Let's start with getting to know you! Tell me about your professional background. What do you do and how did you get here?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Could you share a bit more about your career journey? What are some key roles or experiences that shaped who you are today?

question_templates.template: Give me the 60-second version of your story. What should people know about your background?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What would someone find if they looked you up online? What are you known for?

question_templates.template: What topics are you most knowledgeable about? What could you talk about for hours without getting tired?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If someone introduced you as an expert in something, what would that be?

question_templates.template: What are the areas where people come to you for advice? Where do you add the most value?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What skills or knowledge have taken you years to develop?

question_templates.template: What makes YOUR perspective on these topics unique? What do you see that others might miss?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's something you believe that most people in your field would disagree with?

question_templates.template: What's your 'secret sauce'? What differentiates your approach from others in your space?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Why should someone listen to YOUR advice over anyone else's?

question_templates.template: What are you most proud of in your career? Any notable achievements or milestones?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What results have you helped others achieve?

question_templates.template: What questions do people ask you most often? What do people always want to know from you?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If you had a FAQ page, what would be the top 3 questions on it?

question_templates.template: When people reach out to you for help, what are they usually struggling with?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the most common problem you help people solve?

question_templates.template: What are the most important lessons you've learned that you want to share with others?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If you could only teach someone THREE things, what would they be?

question_templates.template: What advice do you find yourself giving over and over? What's your go-to wisdom?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's a piece of advice that's changed someone's life?

question_templates.template: Do you have any frameworks, methods, or processes that you use or recommend?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Is there a step-by-step approach you typically recommend?

question_templates.template: What values or principles guide your work? What do you stand for?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's non-negotiable for you in how you operate?

question_templates.template: How would you describe your communication style? Are you more direct and concise, or do you prefer detailed explanations?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: When explaining something, do you use lots of examples and stories, or do you prefer to get straight to the point?

question_templates.template: What's your typical tone when helping people? Professional, casual, encouraging, challenging?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If your communication had a personality, how would you describe it?

question_templates.template: Are there any topics your twin should avoid discussing or stay away from?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Anything you definitely don't want the twin to give advice on?

question_templates.template: Who do you imagine will be talking to your twin? Who's your ideal audience?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What level of expertise should your twin assume people have?

question_templates.template: What's the main thing you want your twin to help people with?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If someone spends 10 minutes with your twin, what should they walk away with?
